name: HEY! - A self-care guide I drew with a trackpad
name_original: HEY! - A self-care guide I drew with a trackpad
description:
Hey! 

This game (?) contains simple tips, chill tunes and more to help you stop being sad. 
Remember you're magnificent!

Made on a laptop trackpad, with Flickgame.

<3,
Aodh
